recommendations: Apoorv Nag “I am delighted to provide this enthusiastic recommendation for Sahil, with whom I had the pleasure of collaborating on the community vertical at Tripoto. Sahil's expertise in product design is truly outstanding, and his keen understanding of user journeys sets him apart as a remarkable professional in the field. During our time working together, Sahil consistently showcased his exceptional skills in creating user-centric designs that left a lasting impact on our community members. As a valuable member of the product team, Sahil played a pivotal role in driving user engagement and increasing app downloads through innovative online contests. His creative ideas and strategic execution significantly contributed to the growth of our user base and strengthened our brand presence. When it comes to developing the credit system flow, Sahil's contributions were invaluable. He provided a comprehensive and detailed view of the project's goals and objectives, and his deep insights into user behavior and preferences helped shape a seamless and rewarding user experience. Sahil's ability to connect the dots and design a credit system that incentivized user participation and loyalty was instrumental in achieving our business objectives. In addition to his expertise in product design and user engagement, Sahil possesses several other valuable skills that make him a well-rounded professional. His proficiency in data analysis and interpretation allowed him to make data-driven decisions, optimizing features and functionalities for maximum impact. Furthermore, his excellent communication and collaboration skills made him a true team player, fostering a productive and positive work environment. Sahil's dedication to continuous learning and staying updated with industry trends and best practices is truly commendable. He consistently seeks new ways to enhance his skill set, making him an asset to any team or project he is a part of. In summary, Sahil's exceptional talent in product design, combined with his detailed knowledge of user journeys, makes him an invaluable asset to any organization looking to create compelling and user-friendly experiences. His expertise in driving user engagement, optimizing app downloads, and designing effective credit systems adds immense value to any product development team. I wholeheartedly recommend Sahil for any role related to product design and user experience, as I am confident that his contributions will lead to the success of any project he undertakes.”

Adyasha Mishra “For my first internship in the industry, I had the pleasure to work directly under Sahil. He comes with impeccable team management and leadership skills. Apart from his creative growth strategies, he is a hustler set to give the most innovative ideas and open to positive criticism as a manager. Sahil is always learning, whether it is from a junior, a senior or from someone in a completely different field of work. That's what sets him apart from the rest. He would surely be a positive asset to any team.”
